original: intros u l. split. - intros HlimInf eps. split. + intros N. destruct (HlimInf eps) as [H1 _]. specialize (H1 N). destruct H1 as [n [Hn1 Hn2]]. exists n. split. * lia. * apply Hn1. + destruct (HlimInf eps) as [_ [N HN]]. exists N. intros n Hn. eapply Rle_lt_trans. * apply HN. lia. * destruct (HlimInf eps) as [H1 _]. specialize (H1 n). eapply Rlt_le_trans. apply H1. apply Hn. - intros Hsup. intros M. destruct (Hsup M) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply HN. lia.
